comments:
Generate a Time Frame Historic report:
	Right click on a test suite in the test navigator.
	Then click on the "Report...".
	Select the Time Frame Historic wizard, continue until the Finish is 
enabled, clcik Finish.

The following exception is thrown. Note that this exception appears since the 
html generation is done automatically at the end of the wizard.
The consequence is that a svg file is missing.

Reassigning to Sheldon
This is an SVG problem
This has been fixed.  The reports now generate svg charts.
